name: Jelly Drop A Fun Jellies Game
name_original: Jelly Drop A Fun Jellies Game
description:
Jelly Drop is an amazing adventure into a magical land made all of Jelly. Watch beautiful drops of jelly fall out of the sky. Tap on the jellies to collect them. But avoid hitting the bad jelly.

Ensure to tap as fast as you can, to ensure not to miss any jellies. Click on special item such as the x2 – to earn double the points, the snowflake to freeze and the no bombs icon to remove the bombs. The game is extremely addictive and will have you playing for hours on end.

This game is loads of fun, So what are you waiting for. Download and play Jelly Drops!
